metadata.name: Potter's hand
metadata.description:
Since my childhood, I have always loved to see pottery, how they give shapes something from Mud.

Now when I have grown up I love to shoot them and I still admire how beautifully they give a new shape.

This art is also going to die soon and there are very few artists shows still do pottery and make this art alive.

Shot this in Pottery Village, Near Bangalore.

Photograph by Rahul Singi
Edition: 1/1
Dimensions: 6016 × 4016
Format: Jpeg
